animeDescription: The Ultra Super Pictures Special Stage event announced at AnimeJapan 2015 on Saturday that the Miss Monochrome television anime series will receive a second season. The season will run within the 30-minute Ultra Super Anime Time block beginning on July 3, 2015.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Miss Monochrome The Animation', 'Miss Monochrome The Animation 3']
